message.body: Hi! So I'm meeting with the birth center to revisit my video proposal on Tuesday. If post production was more like...dec, would you still be interested in doing the editing ?
The pay would prob be ~5-6K for a 15-20 min video and 3-4 mini videos made up of footage from the main vid

Hi! I have another disability video with a deadline of january 1, then leaving town for a week but could start working on it mid January (like the 7th). I have a lil questionnaire I can send you that will help me get a realistic timeline together and figure out what kind of files you need at the end. I'll email that to u and we can see if it will work out!
Okay! All of my info is sorta conjecture at this point, hopefully I will know a lot more after the meeting on Tuesday. Wish me luck!!
You got this girl!!! Let me know what happens. I'll be thinking of ya Tuesday!
Thanks boo. Also maybe we can swim this week!!
Definitely! I'm in DC tmw night but off all week!!! Swimming!
Yeah I was thinking more like thurs or from!
That would be perfect. Good luck Tuesday! I'll send you all the positive energy.
Thanks so much! Also I just read through the survey, all good stuff to think about and I will hopefully know more in the near future
Awesome. Let me know if you need anything else to prepare.
